text: 1704 (MDCCIV) was a leap year starting on Tuesday in the Gregorian calendar and a leap year starting on Saturday in the Julian calendar. As of the start of the year, the Gregorian calendar was 11 days ahead of the Julian calendar. It remained in localized use until 1923. == Events == * The Dutch and British conquer Gibraltar == Births == * February 5 - Anne Christine of Sulzbach * November 10 - Margravine Johanna of Baden-Baden ==Deaths== * May 3 - Heinrich Biber, Austrian composer * February 24 - Marc-Antoine Charpentier, French composer * October 28 - John Locke, English philosopher
